entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain mixed with drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers and drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few showers and drizzle ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
